name: Underground Pool
overview: BRING ON YOUR BEST POOL GAME TO THE NINTENDO DS! Magnificent graphics and precision ball movement with touch screen capability; billiards has never been this real! Features: 5 game modes - including: • 8 ball and 9 ball • Touch screen control • Multiplayer Mode - up to 4 players • 8 tables with various speeds • 8 cool characters to choose from • Customized game options
